javadoc:
High-level prototype of a function based on Varnodes, describing the inputs and outputs
 of this function.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a FunctionPrototype backed by a local symbolmap

params.name: ls
params.comment: is the LocalSymbolMap backing the prototype

params.name: func
params.comment: is the function using the symbolmap

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct an internally backed prototype based on a FunctionSignature prototype

params.name: proto
params.comment: is the FunctionSignature used to internally back input parameters

params.name: cspec
params.comment: is the compiler spec used to pick prototype model

params.name: voidimpliesdotdotdot
params.comment: set to true if a void prototype is interpreted as varargs

methods.name: grabFromFunction
methods.comment: Populate Function Prototype from information attached to a function in the Program DB.

params.name: f
params.comment: is the function to grab prototype from

params.name: overrideExtrapop
params.comment: is the override value to use for extrapop

params.name: doOverride
params.comment: is true if the override value should be used

methods.javadoc: check if the code injection does not return
methods.name: isNoReturnInjection
methods.comment: check if the code injection does not return

methods.javadoc: @return the number of defined parameters for this function prototype
methods.name: getNumParams

return.comment: the number of defined parameters for this function prototype

methods.name: getParam

return.comment:
the i'th HighParam to this function prototype or null
 if this prototype is not backed by a LocalSymbolMap

methods.name: getParameterDefinitions

return.comment:
parameter definitions if prototype was produced
 from a FunctionSignature or null if backed by a 
 LocalSymbolMap

methods.javadoc:
@return true if this prototype is backed by a LocalSymbolMap, or 
 false if generated from a FunctionSignature.
methods.name: isBackedByLocalSymbolMap

return.comment:
true if this prototype is backed by a LocalSymbolMap, or 
 false if generated from a FunctionSignature.

methods.javadoc: @return the return type for the function
methods.name: getReturnType

return.comment: the return type for the function

methods.javadoc: @return the return storage for the function
methods.name: getReturnStorage

return.comment: the return storage for the function

methods.javadoc: @return the number of extra bytes popped off by this functions return
methods.name: getExtraPop

return.comment: the number of extra bytes popped off by this functions return

methods.javadoc: @return true if this function has variable arguments
methods.name: isVarArg

return.comment: true if this function has variable arguments

methods.javadoc: @return true if this function should be inlined by the decompile
methods.name: isInline

return.comment: true if this function should be inlined by the decompile

methods.javadoc: @return true if calls to this function do not return
methods.name: hasNoReturn

return.comment: true if calls to this function do not return

methods.javadoc: @return true if this function is a method taking a 'this' pointer as a parameter
methods.name: hasThisPointer

return.comment: true if this function is a method taking a 'this' pointer as a parameter

methods.javadoc: @return true if this function is an (object-oriented) constructor
methods.name: isConstructor

return.comment: true if this function is an (object-oriented) constructor

methods.javadoc: @return true if this function is an (object-oriented) destructor
methods.name: isDestructor

return.comment: true if this function is an (object-oriented) destructor

methods.javadoc: @return calling convention model name specific to the associated compiler spec
methods.name: getModelName

return.comment: calling convention model name specific to the associated compiler spec

methods.javadoc: @return generic calling convention
methods.name: getGenericCallingConvention
buildPrototypeXML
methods.comment: append an XML string representing this function prototype

params.name: res
params.comment: is where the string should be appended

params.name: dtmanage
params.comment: is the DataTypeManager for building type reference tags

methods.name: readPrototypeXML
methods.comment: Parse the function prototype from  tag.

params.name: parser
params.comment: is the XML document to parse

params.name: dtmanage
params.comment: is the DataTypeManager used to parse data-type tags

name: FunctionPrototype
comment:
High-level prototype of a function based on Varnodes, describing the inputs and outputs
 of this function.
